There‚Äôs a ton of hate circulating around this kid and his parents. I feel there should be some clarity around the situation.

1) There‚Äôs no proof the kid did anything racist and owning/being near a Confederate flag doesn‚Äôt explicitly mean someone is racist. It‚Äôs a pride thing that most of us don‚Äôt get though can have racist roots.

2) The mother didn‚Äôt set up the GoFundMe and the account DMing the MMA fighter might‚Äôve been faked. Now this doesn‚Äôt mean she got someone else to do it for her, but I‚Äôm inclined to believe it was some random person thinking it was a good idea or attempting to scam the public.

3) He was straight up bullied. If he did say something racist or even if other‚Äôs have it worse, he was still bullied. It‚Äôs never okay to pick on someone and no matter how sever the bullying is it can be emotionally damaging. He just happened to blow up on social media and now people are digging into their past and attacking them because that‚Äôs how the internet is. It can be kind and/or funny then it‚Äôll try and destroy you. (Ken Bone anyone?)
